response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I am offering you the chance to own it at an exclusive price of $750,000. I believe this is an exceptional value considering its rarity and the benefits it offers. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
